backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing accounts and user profiles with admin-gated queries and role-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a footer update linking Contact Us to the /telegram route.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summary list of various frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global border/background text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main TSX script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global layout, transitions, and wraps pages with shared UI components.
Component gating admin-only content using Internet Identity and admin role checks with loading and denial states.
frontend/src/components/GetStartedForm.t: Account creation form with validation and backend mutation followed by optional navigation callback.
frontend/src/components/GreenSectionCard: Styled card wrapper with green gradient and hover effects supporting div attributes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileTile.tsx: Profile display tile showing avatar, name, optional title, and placeholder badge.
frontend/src/components/RouteTransitionO: Full‑screen loading overlay shown during global route transitions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders a footer with industry recognition, a Tesla-associated companies list, legal navigation buttons, and dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and route transitions.
frontend/src/components/UsersWorldwideKp: Displays an animated worldwide user count fetched from account statistics.
frontend/src/config/admin.ts: Defines a placeholder admin principal string for configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for account creation, account statistics, profile management, and admin checks using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteTransition.ts: Provides a context and hook for animated route transitions with timed navigation and cleanup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, base typography, and custom scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPlansPage.tsx: Displays a grid of selectable partnership plans and navigates users to the signup page with the chosen plan.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersPage.tsx: Admin-only page that lists user accounts with loading, error, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page featuring hero content, KPI display, and promo sections for user engagement.
frontend/src/pages/PlanSignupPage.tsx: Signup form for creating an account under a selected plan with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/PlanSuccessPage.tsx: Confirmation page shown after account creation with a prompt to continue to Telegram.
frontend/src/pages/PlanTelegramPage.tsx: Renders a page prompting users to join a Telegram channel with steps and a button linking to the channel.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy with scrollable sections outlining data collection, usage, and disclosure.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows a list of product categories with icons, descriptions, and features inside styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/TelegramPage.tsx: Provides a welcome page encouraging new users to join the Telegram community with a call‑to‑action button.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the terms and conditions in a scrollable card with multiple detailed sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH-based color system, layout settings, custom keyframes, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for ongoing development and rebranding work.
